document.full_text: securities regulators are probing chinese and other foreign companies with questionable accounting practices that have used backdoor methods to access u.s. capital markets, a top regulator said on monday.
document.title: sec probing fraud at u.s.-listed foreign companies
lines_and_colors: securities regulators are probing chinese and other foreign companies with questionable accounting practices that have used backdoor methods to access u.s. capital markets, a top regulator said on monday.
